option.name: originalContent
option.value: spring.h2.console.enabled=true spring.h2.console.path=/h2-console # file-based H2 DB (persists across restarts) # Use DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1 instead of DB_CLOSE_ON_EXIT (newer H2 versions don't support DB_CLOSE_ON_EXIT) spring.datasource.url=jdbc:h2:file:./data/tradingdb;AUTO_SERVER=TRUE;DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1 spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.h2.Driver spring.datasource.username=sa spring.datasource.password= spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.thymeleaf.cache=false server.port=8080

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: spring.h2.console.enabled=true spring.h2.console.path=/h2-console # file-based H2 DB (persists across restarts) # Use DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1 instead of DB_CLOSE_ON_EXIT (newer H2 versions don't support DB_CLOSE_ON_EXIT) spring.datasource.url=jdbc:h2:file:./data/tradingdb;AUTO_SERVER=TRUE;DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1 spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.h2.Driver spring.datasource.username=sa spring.datasource.password= spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.thymeleaf.cache=false server.port=8080
